text: The District of Yverdon was a district in the canton of Vaud, Switzerland. The seat of the district was the city of Yverdon-les-Bains. ** Cercle de Belmont- sur-Yverdon * Belmont-sur-Yverdon * Ependes * Essert-Pittet * Gossens * Gressy * Oppens * Orzens * Pomy * Suchy * Ursins * Valeyres-sous-Ursins ** Cercle de Champvent * Chamblon * Champvent * Essert-sous-Champvent * Mathod * Montagny- près-Yverdon * Orges * Suscévaz * Treycovagnes * Valeyres-sous-Montagny * Villars-sous-Champvent * Vugelles-La Mothe ** Cercle de Molondin * Bioley- Magnoux * Chanéaz * Chavannes-le-Chêne * Chêne-Pâquier * Cronay * Cuarny * Démoret * Donneloye * Mézery-près-Donneloye * Molondin * Prahins * Rovray * Villars-Epeney * Yvonand ** Cercle d'Yverdon * Cheseaux-Noréaz * Yverdon-les- Bains Category:Former districts of Vaud
title: Yverdon (district)
